snippet.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Greece DLC Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
We bet a few of you have been wondering over the past couple of days about the next move in our Euro Truck Simulator 2 adventure. Brace yourselves, as this time, the routes will guide you through the captivating landscapes of Greece!

Please keep in mind that everything in this short video teaser is still very much 'WORK IN PROGRESS' and further changes might be applied.

If you want to help us - please add this upcoming expansion to your Steam Wishlist! 

Read more about the new DLC: https://blog.scssoft.com/2023/11/introducing-greece.html
---
